languages.text: "Что человеку не стоит бывать в столь жутких местах. Мы бродим по кладбищу древних ужасов, чье существование с трудом выносит разум. Касаемся их вещей, читаем их слова... Кто знает, как это изменит нас? Кто знает, стоит ли нам после этого возвращаться в обитаемые миры и нести с собой ту отраву, которой делится с нами эта ксеносская тьма?"

"No human should have to journey to a place as dire as this. We are wandering in a graveyard of ancient terrors whose existence strains the mind to acknowledge. Touching their relics, reading their words... Who can say how it will change us? Who can say if we even ought to return to inhabited worlds after this, befouled as we will be by the poison that this xenos darkness is feeding us?"
languages.original_text: "Что человеку не стоит бывать в столь жутких местах. Мы бродим по кладбищу древних ужасов, чье существование с трудом выносит разум. Касаемся их вещей, читаем их слова... Кто знает, как это изменит нас? Кто знает, стоит ли нам после этого возвращаться в обитаемые миры и нести с собой ту отраву, которой делится с нами эта ксеносская тьма?"

traits.locale_text: "Only that no human should have to journey to a place as dire as this. We are wandering in the graveyard of ancient terrors whose existence strains the mind to acknowledge. Touching their relics, reading their words... Who can say how it will change us? Who can say if we should later return to populated worlds, befouled by the poison that this xenos darkness is feeding us?"
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Kein Mensch sollte an einen so unwirtlichen Ort reisen. Wir befinden uns auf einen Friedhof uralter Schrecken, deren Existenz sich der Verstand verschließt. Wir berühren ihre Relikte, lesen ihre Worte ... Wer kann sagen, wie uns all das verändern wird? Wer kann sagen, ob wir überhaupt in bewohnten Welten zurückkehren sollten, nachdem wir von dem Gift befallen sind, mit dem uns diese außerweltliche Dunkelheit nährt?"
languages.original_text: "No human should have to journey to a place as dire as this. We are wandering in a graveyard of ancient terrors whose existence strains the mind to acknowledge. Touching their relics, reading their words... Who can say how it will change us? Who can say if we even ought to return to inhabited worlds after this, befouled as we will be by the poison that this xenos darkness is feeding us?"

traits.locale_text: "Kein Mensch sollte an einen so unwirtlichen Ort reisen. Wir befinden uns auf einen Friedhof uralter Schrecken, deren Existenz sich der Verstand verschließt. Wir berühren ihre Relikte, lesen ihre Worte ... Wer kann sagen, wie uns all das verändern wird? Wer kann sagen, ob wir überhaupt in bewohnten Welten zurückkehren sollten, nachdem wir von dem Gift befallen sind, mit dem uns diese außerweltliche Dunkelheit nährt?"
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: « Aucun humain ne devrait avoir à s'aventurer dans un tel antre de perdition. Nous nous trouvons dans un cimetière d'horreurs ancestrales dont la seule existence défie l'entendement. Toucher leurs reliques, lire leurs paroles... Qui sait à quel point nous en sortirons {mf|changés|changées} ? Qui sait si nous devrions regagner les mondes habités après cela, {mf|souillés|souillées} comme nous le serons par le poison dont ces ténèbres xénos nous abreuvent ? »
languages.original_text: "No human should have to journey to a place as dire as this. We are wandering in a graveyard of ancient terrors whose existence strains the mind to acknowledge. Touching their relics, reading their words... Who can say how it will change us? Who can say if we even ought to return to inhabited worlds after this, befouled as we will be by the poison that this xenos darkness is feeding us?"

traits.locale_text: « Aucun humain ne devrait avoir à s'aventurer dans un tel antre de perdition. Nous nous trouvons dans un cimetière d'horreurs ancestrales dont la seule existence défie l'entendement. Toucher leurs reliques, lire leurs paroles... Qui sait à quel point nous en sortirons {mf|changés|changées} ? Qui sait si nous devrions regagner les mondes habités après cela, {mf|souillés|souillées} comme nous le serons par le poison dont ces ténèbres xénos nous abreuvent ? »
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: 「このような悲惨な場所を旅しなければならない人間はいないはずだ。我々はその存在を認めざるを得ない古代の恐怖の墓場をさまよっている。彼らの遺物に触れ、彼らの言葉を読んでいる…それが私たちをどう変えるのか、誰がわかるのだ？ゼノの闇が与えてる毒に冒されておきながら、この後、我々は人の住む世界に戻るべきなのだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "No human should have to journey to a place as dire as this. We are wandering in a graveyard of ancient terrors whose existence strains the mind to acknowledge. Touching their relics, reading their words... Who can say how it will change us? Who can say if we even ought to return to inhabited worlds after this, befouled as we will be by the poison that this xenos darkness is feeding us?"

traits.locale_text: 「このような悲惨な場所を旅しなければならない人間はいないはずだ。我々はその存在を認めざるを得ない古代の恐怖の墓場をさまよっている。彼らの遺物に触れ、彼らの言葉を読んでいる…それが私たちをどう変えるのか、誰がわかるのだ？ゼノの闇が与えてる毒に冒されておきながら、この後、我々は人の住む世界に戻るべきなのだろうか？」
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: «Ningún ser humano debería tener que viajar a un lugar tan espantoso como este. Nos hemos adentrado en el cementerio de terrores tan antiguos que su existencia es casi imposible de aceptar. Tocar sus reliquias, leer sus palabras... ¿Quién sabe cuánto nos afectará? ¿Quién sabe si deberíamos volver a pisar un mundo habitado tras esto, mancillados como estaremos por el veneno que nos inculca esta negrura xenos?».
languages.original_text: "No human should have to journey to a place as dire as this. We are wandering in a graveyard of ancient terrors whose existence strains the mind to acknowledge. Touching their relics, reading their words... Who can say how it will change us? Who can say if we even ought to return to inhabited worlds after this, befouled as we will be by the poison that this xenos darkness is feeding us?"

traits.locale_text: «Ningún ser humano debería tener que viajar a un lugar tan espantoso como este. Nos hemos adentrado en el cementerio de terrores tan antiguos que su existencia es casi imposible de aceptar. Tocar sus reliquias, leer sus palabras... ¿Quién sabe cuánto nos afectará? ¿Quién sabe si deberíamos volver a pisar un mundo habitado tras esto, mancillados como estaremos por el veneno que nos inculca esta negrura xenos?».
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: “这里如此恐怖，根本不是任何人该来的地方。我们徘徊在某个古老、恐怖的墓地附近，我们甚至对它们的存在都知之甚少。触摸它们的遗物，阅读它们的文字……谁知道这么做会对我们产生怎样的影响？谁知道等这一切结束之后，我们真的该回到有人居住的世界吗？万一这些异形邪恶的蛊毒玷污了我们的心智呢？”
languages.original_text: "No human should have to journey to a place as dire as this. We are wandering in a graveyard of ancient terrors whose existence strains the mind to acknowledge. Touching their relics, reading their words... Who can say how it will change us? Who can say if we even ought to return to inhabited worlds after this, befouled as we will be by the poison that this xenos darkness is feeding us?"

traits.locale_text: “这里如此恐怖，根本不是任何人该来的地方。我们徘徊在某个古老、恐怖的墓地附近，我们甚至对它们的存在都知之甚少。触摸它们的遗物，阅读它们的文字……谁知道这么做会对我们产生怎样的影响？谁知道等这一切结束之后，我们真的该回到有人居住的世界吗？万一这些异形邪恶的蛊毒玷污了我们的心智呢？”
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Hiçbir insan böylesine uğursuz bir yere yolculuk etmek zorunda kalmamalı. Varlıklarını algılayabilmek için zihni çekiştirmenin gerektiği kadim dehşetlerin kabristanında dolanıyoruz. Yadigârlarına dokunuyoruz, sözcüklerini okuyoruz... Bunların bizi nasıl değiştireceğini kim bilebilir? Bu zeno karanlığının bize zerk ettiği zehirli nüfuzun sonrasında insanların dünyalarına dönüp dönmememiz gerektiğini bile kim bilebilir?"
languages.original_text: "No human should have to journey to a place as dire as this. We are wandering in a graveyard of ancient terrors whose existence strains the mind to acknowledge. Touching their relics, reading their words... Who can say how it will change us? Who can say if we even ought to return to inhabited worlds after this, befouled as we will be by the poison that this xenos darkness is feeding us?"
